ctx: intros m z s Hmap sr nr Hcard.
intros m z s Hmap sr nr Hcard.
intros m z s Hmap sr nr Hcard.
intros m z s Hmap sr nr Hcard.
exceptions.tactic: apply ex_i_aux with (t:=Iter (f m) (ndN m - card s) z) in Hcard_sr; auto.

original: intros m z s Hmap sr nr Hcard. unfold exds. simpl. intros Hcard_sr. apply Nat.lt_le_pred in Hcard_sr. apply Nat.lt_succ_r in Hcard_sr. apply ex_i_aux with (t:=Iter (f m) (ndN m - card s) z) in Hcard_sr; auto. destruct Hcard_sr as [i [Hi1 Hi2]]. exists i. split; auto.
